name: Social Rebellion
description:
Created for Brackeys Jam 2021.2, "Let There Be Chaos"

As a social media savant, use your virtual phone to send targeted social media posts in different territories. Your goal is to get followers, get them angry, and then make them take the capital. Don't worry everything will work out.

Tried to fit the theme by making the player cause chaos with their actions.

Controls:

  • Left Click and drag posts to territories to make stuff happen.

Audio is from freesound.org

  • Game music from BloodPixelHero
  • "Booing" noise from xtrgamr
